3f0f8ead9a0598c0682f40ffa5600878.question_template: donne moi les moyennes de {family_relation} pour la {codeperiexam}
3f0f8ead9a0598c0682f40ffa5600878.sql_template:
SELECT em.libematifr AS matiere, ed.moyemati AS moyenne, ex.codeperiexam AS codeTrimestre 
FROM Eduperiexam ex, Edumoymaticopie ed, Edumatiere em, Eleve e 
WHERE e.idedusrv = ed.idenelev 
AND ed.codemati = em.codemati 
AND ex.codeperiexam = ed.codeperiexam 
AND e.Idpersonne IN ({id_personne}) 
AND ed.moyemati NOT LIKE '0.00' 
AND ed.codeperiexam = {codeperiexam};

c2f4131c1b9632d76505b9fce9b7b158.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, p.Tel1, p.Tel2, p.AdresseFr
FROM personne p
JOIN eleve e ON p.id = e.IdPersonne
WHERE e.IdPersonne IN ({id_personne});

953b3decd22f1b75e7cc3a667751d8c9.question_template: donne moi les dates et les durée et les matieres de retards effectué par {family_relation}
953b3decd22f1b75e7cc3a667751d8c9.sql_template:
SELECT r.Date, r.Duree, m.NomMatiereFr 
FROM retard r 
JOIN matiere m ON r.Matiere = m.id 
WHERE r.Inscription IN (SELECT id FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN ({id_personne})));

437fb0033da5b7276ee9adcb906a254e.question_template: donne moi la repartion des examens pour {family_relation} de la {codeperiexam} pour les examens
437fb0033da5b7276ee9adcb906a254e.sql_template:
SELECT 
    m.NomMatiereFr, 
    re.date, 
    re.heureDeb AS HeureDebut, 
    re.heureFin AS HeureFin, 
    s.nomSalleFr AS Salle
FROM 
    repartitionexamen re
JOIN 
    matiere m ON re.idMatiere = m.id
JOIN 
    salle s ON re.idSalle = s.id
WHERE 
    re.idTrimestre = {codeperiexam} 
    AND re.idClasse IN (SELECT id FROM classe WHERE id IN (SELECT Classe FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN ({id_personne}))));

e204ea26eb6f15217756f6b77a746fe5.question_template: donne moi les paiement effectuée pour {family_relation}
e204ea26eb6f15217756f6b77a746fe5.sql_template:
SELECT p.*, pm.Libelle AS MotifPaiement
FROM paiement p
JOIN paiementmotif pm ON p.MotifPaiement = pm.id
WHERE p.Inscription IN (SELECT id FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN ({id_personne})));

3be6aa64b85c6f6fbfd1279c4a184867.question_template: donne moi l emploi du temps pour {family_relation} pour {jour}
3be6aa64b85c6f6fbfd1279c4a184867.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS nom_enseignant,
    p.PrenomFr AS prenom_enseignant,
    m.NomMatiereFr AS nom_matiere,
    s.nomSalleFr AS nom_salle,
    sc1.debut AS debut_seance,
    sc2.fin AS fin_seance
FROM
    emploidutemps e
JOIN
    jour j ON e.Jour = j.id AND j.libelleJourFr = {jour}
JOIN
    semaine sm ON e.Semaine = sm.id AND sm.id = 1
JOIN
    salle s ON e.Salle = s.id
JOIN
    enseingant en ON e.Enseignant = en.id
JOIN
    personne p ON en.idPersonne = p.id
JOIN
    matiere m ON e.Matiere = m.id
JOIN
    seance sc1 ON e.SeanceDebut = sc1.id
JOIN
    seance sc2 ON e.SeanceFin = sc2.id
WHERE
    e.Classe IN (SELECT id FROM classe WHERE id IN (SELECT Classe FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN ({id_personne}))));

a2bcfe4bfc5e04b21afe0e3c76da4919.question_template: donne moi le nombre des absences de {family_relation}
a2bcfe4bfc5e04b21afe0e3c76da4919.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_absences
FROM absence a
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id
WHERE ie.Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN ({id_personne}));

232a2cb3f0dbd19c0577f70c787a5176.sql_template:
SELECT 
    d.nomDisciplineFr 
FROM 
    discipline d 
JOIN 
    eleve e ON e.IdPersonne IN ({id_personne}) 
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve ie ON ie.Eleve = e.id 
JOIN 
    classe c ON c.id = ie.Classe 
JOIN 
    matiere m ON m.id = d.id 
WHERE 
    e.IdPersonne IN ({id_personne})

8d321f217f38802021dafe0c14b0827e.question_template: donner moi le nombre d'abscence de {family_relation}
8d321f217f38802021dafe0c14b0827e.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_absences
FROM absence a
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
WHERE e.IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716) AND e.IdPersonne = (SELECT id FROM personne WHERE PrenomFr = 'Ghazal')

6425a20cccac02858f89578a67fc7111.question_template: donne moi le nombre d'abscence de {family_relation}
6425a20cccac02858f89578a67fc7111.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_absences 
FROM absence a 
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id 
WHERE ie.Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716))

f0a0723347fae78cf8b2ae48a099d525.question_template: donne moi une comparaison des notes entre mes deux enfants
f0a0723347fae78cf8b2ae48a099d525.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS nom_enfant,
    p.PrenomFr AS prenom_enfant,
    n.dc1 AS note_devoir_controle
FROM 
    noteeleveparmatiere n
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve ie ON n.id_inscription = ie.id
JOIN 
    eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
WHERE 
    e.IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716)
    AND n.id_matiere = (SELECT id FROM matiere WHERE NomMatiereFr = 'Maths')

00827747241f8369328b4cf1e7171c26.sql_template:
SELECT c.CODECLASSEFR AS classe
FROM inscriptioneleve ie
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id
WHERE e.IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716) AND e.IdPersonne = (SELECT id FROM personne WHERE PrenomFr = 'Ghazal')

7e7704822ddddcccd381c7cc87164359.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS nom_enfant,
    p.PrenomFr AS prenom_enfant,
    e.DateNaissance AS date_naissance,
    e.LieuNaissance AS lieu_naissance,
    e.Solde AS solde
FROM 
    eleve e
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
WHERE 
    e.IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716) AND p.PrenomFr = 'Ghazal'

fb516e4af0071d877a527ebb7bd497ec.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS nom_enseignant,
    p.PrenomFr AS prenom_enseignant
FROM
    enseingant en
JOIN
    personne p ON en.idPersonne = p.id
JOIN
    enseigantmatiere em ON en.id = em.idPersonne
JOIN
    anneescolaire a ON em.anneeSco = a.id
JOIN
    inscriptioneleve ie ON em.idMatiere = ie.Eleve
WHERE
    ie.Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716))
    AND ie.Eleve = (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne = 7012)

43f16bbcbd4776a45f8fb281fec78b95.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS nom_enseignant,
    p.PrenomFr AS prenom_enseignant
FROM 
    enseingant en
JOIN 
    personne p ON en.idPersonne = p.id
JOIN 
    enseigantmatiere em ON en.id = em.idPersonne
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve ie ON em.anneeSco = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = (SELECT DISTINCT AnneeScolaire FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne = 7716)))
WHERE 
    ie.Eleve IN (SELECT id FROM eleve WHERE IdPersonne IN (7012, 7716))
